name: market for wood chipping, industrial residual wood, stationary electric chipper | wood chipping, industrial residual wood, stationary electric chipper | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7377/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'wood chipping, industrial residual wood, stationary electric chipper', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of wood chipping of industrial residual wood, using a stationary electric chipper. The service represents the chipping of 1 kg of dry mass wood chips by a chopper powered by a motor of 37 kW and an additional 5 kW-motor for the feeding of the wood. Its lifetime capacity is 30,000 hours or 100,000 piled m3. The process includes infrastructure, electricity consumption and lubricants/greases. The input of wood is excluded and should be added manually.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/161:Sawmilling and planing of wood/1610:Sawmilling and planing of wood
